name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instagram Auto Liker Post Reels & Comments by Brijesh.work

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Boost your Instagram engagement with automated post liking and manage profiles effortlessly. Simplifies your social media workflow.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Instagram Auto Liker & Profile Manager is a powerful Chrome extension designed to help Instagram users and influencers automate their engagement and streamline profile management. Whether you're managing multiple accounts or looking to increase your engagement on posts, this tool has got you covered.

Key Features:
Auto-Like Posts and Reels: Automatically like posts and reels as you scroll through your Instagram feed. Set random delay intervals to mimic human-like behavior.
Profile Data Management: Easily collect, update, and send profile information to your preferred API. Keep track of follower counts, following status, bio updates, and more.
Dynamic Page Detection: The extension automatically detects profile pages and hides the automation interface when not needed, providing a seamless user experience.
Flexible Configuration: Set custom parameters for your auto-like actions, including adjustable delay times to avoid Instagram's anti-bot detection.
Real-Time Content Monitoring: Utilizes advanced content detection techniques to ensure all newly loaded posts and reels are included for engagement, even without refreshing the page.
How It Works:
Auto-Liking: Activate the auto-like feature directly from a simple floating panel. The extension will systematically like posts and reels while respecting configurable time delays to avoid Instagram limits.
Profile Updates: The extension gathers detailed information from your Instagram profile, such as username, bio, post count, and follower statistics. Data can be sent directly to your API endpoint for tracking and analytics.
API Integration: Built-in support for sending collected data to a specified API endpoint, allowing seamless integration with third-party tools and platforms.
Who Can Benefit?
Influencers: Save time by automating likes to boost engagement across multiple posts.
Social Media Managers: Efficiently manage and track multiple Instagram accounts from a single interface.
Marketers: Gain valuable insights by collecting and analyzing profile data for strategic growth.
Content Creators: Engage with more content without the repetitive task of manually liking every post or reel.
Privacy & Security:
We take your privacy seriously. This extension does not collect or share any personal data beyond what is required for its core functionality. All data processed is used locally or sent to your specified API endpoint with your consent.

Easy to Use:
Install the extension from the Chrome Web Store.
Open Instagram in your browser.
Activate the auto-like feature with a simple click, and watch it work for you.
Use the profile manager to collect and update your account data effortlessly.
Support & Feedback:
We are committed to providing continuous updates and improvements. Feel free to reach out for support or provide feedback to help us make this extension even better!

Start automating your Instagram today with the Instagram Auto Liker & Profile Manager extension!
